original_text: Then the priest shall wash his clothes and bathe his body in water, and afterward he may come into the camp. But the priest shall be unclean until evening.
korean_text: 제사장은 자기의 옷을 빨고 물로 몸을 씻은 후에 진영에 들어갈 것이라 그는 저녁까지 부정하리라

sentences.original_text: Then the priest shall wash his clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 제사장은 그의 옷을 씻을 것이요

sentences.original_text: and bathe his body in water
and afterward he may come into the camp
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 그는 진영으로 들어올 수 있으리라

sentences.original_text: But the priest shall be unclean until evening
